name: update a booking

testSteps.description: Example: {id=1, firstName=James, lastName=Brown, totalPrice=111, depositPaid=true, checkIn=2018-01-01, checkOut=2019-01-01, additionalNeeds=Breakfast, contentType=application/json, accept=application/json, username=admin, password=password123}

children.description:
When the user create a token
| contentType | username | password |
| application/json | admin | password123 |
user executes a POST on the resource /auth
